panels.description:
ETCD Health server ratio

Number of Postgres cluster in Failsafe mode

targets.expr:
sum(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls) /
 count(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls)
or on() vector(0)

panels.description:
Blue  = PostgreSQL

Green = Pgbouncer

Azure = Patroni

Purple = Postgres Exporter

Deep Purple = Pgboucner Exporter

Orange = PG VIP
panels.title: Instances

panels.description:
PostgreSQL Cluster Load 5
Load = active session time / total cpu time
panels.title: Cluster StdLoad5

panels.description: Transactions committed + rollback per second in last 1 minute for all instances (pgsql + pgrds)
panels.title: Instance TPS

targets.expr:
sum(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls) /
 count(up{job="etcd", cls="etcd"}) by (cls)
or on() vector(0)

panels.description: etcd is the DCS used by patroni
panels.title: ETCD Aliveness

panels.description:
How long since patroni the HA agent successfully connect to DCS:etcd.
Max amoung cluster

value larger than 20s needs extra attention
panels.title: DCS Last Seen

panels.description: Time since patroni last successful connect to DCS:etcd service
panels.title: Patroni DCS Last Seen

panels.description: Services SLI is measured by Average Service UP time of last 1 day
